regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR white] [makelist.param2][/COLOR] [COLOR orange][makelist.param3][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param4][/COLOR] VS [COLOR orange][makelist.param5][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param6][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[lists]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6">\s*<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + e + '/' + r + '?origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] #z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) if 'tinyurl' in z: #sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] #sort1 = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1]) for i in z if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] sort1 = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1]) for i in z if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] return sort + sort1 else: #sort = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1]] #sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1]] sort = [(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'watchkobestreams' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreams' not in i[0]] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'watchkobestreams' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0]] return sort + sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return url = client.schedule('http://6streams.tv/ncaaf-streams/') return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('http://yrsprts.stream/live?v=nba?g=knicks') r = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)" title="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in r if 'c=nba' in i[0]] return sort

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re w = re.findall('(?s)<iframe frameborder=0 height=100% width=100% src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] h = client.request(w) i = re.findall('player">\s*<iframe style="width:100%;height:100%;" src="([^"]*)', h)[0] t = i.replace('ustv.php?ch=','srv/') e = t + '.m3u8' return e + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:79.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/79.0&Referer=' + i

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re u = re.findall('<h2 class=\'post-title\'>\s*<a href=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)', page_data) return u

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,jsunpack import re w = re.findall('source:\s"([^"]*)', page_data)[0] return w

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re u = re.findall('(?s)<h2 class=\'post-title entry-title\'>\s*<a href=\'([^\']*)\'>\s*([^<]*)', page_data) return u

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re w = re.findall('<iframe src=\'([^\']*)', page_data)[0] h = client.request(w) i = re.findall('source:\s*\'([^\']*)', h)[0] return i + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=' + w

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('http://yoursports.stream') r = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)" title="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [('http://yoursports.stream/'+i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in r if 'c=nba' in i[0]] return sort

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re items = re.findall('(?s)float: right;">([^<]*)(?:.*?f=")([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],'http://sports24.club'+i[1]) for i in items] return sort

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,base64 l = re.findall('atob\(["|\']([^"|\']*)', page_data)[0]; l = base64.b64decode(l) l = l.replace('https:','') l = l.replace('//','https://') if l.startswith('/'): l = 'https://sports24.club' + l return l + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=[makelist.param2]'
